text:
Upgraded my previous unit of 9” to 11” with Keeve again after almost 7 years of use. As usual, Keeve is very patient in explaining the units and what will be suitable based on your preferences.
Installation was super quick as well.
☺️But most importantly is the after sales support that Keeve provides. ✨ Top Tier even after years! Buy with confidence!

Upgraded my Harrier 10" headunit to the Harrier/Venza 12.3" headunit, experience has been excellent so far. New features include split screen enabled: run waze & youtube side-by-side, navigation direction on hud, 360 car camera (sold separately). Highly recommended for anyone looking to upgrade their headunit.
Good service. Keeve still will spend time to teach on using the android player, the function of it. The installation is fast and neat.
Keeve has been the go to person for upgrading the in car head unit and he did not disappoint this time! Fast installation and great results! Reasonable prices too. Recommend !
Most powerful and advance android headunit for you car. Installation was a breeze. Keeve is also friendly and approachable. He will teach you how to use it. Everything is done nicely. Great job!
